title: ICAI Invites Feedback on January 2026 CA Exam Question Papers
content:
# ICAI Invites Feedback on January 2026 CA Exam Question Papers

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne January 2026 CA Examinations ke question papers par candidates se observations (feedback) invite kiye hain, jiske liye official announcement January 13, 2026 ko release hua hai.

This is a crucial opportunity for all candidates to highlight any discrepancies or errors they might have found in the question papers.

*   **What is it about?** ICAI is inviting observations on the question papers of CA Final, Intermediate, Foundation, and Post Qualification Courses (INTT-AT & IRM) examinations held in January 2026.
*   **Submission Deadline:** Candidates must submit their feedback latest by January 27, 2026.
*   **How to Submit Feedback:**
    *   **Email:** You can send your observations via email to examfeedback@icai.in.
    *   **Speed Post:** Alternatively, feedback can be sent through Speed Post to The Joint Secretary (Exams), The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India, ICAI Bhawan, Indraprastha Marg, New Delhi 110 002.
*   **Mandatory Details:** Please ensure your submission is complete and non-anonymous. It must clearly mention your Name, Registration Number, Roll Number, Email ID, and Mobile Number. Also, specify the question number and paper code for each observation. Incomplete submissions may be rejected.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/post.html?post_id=2026)

*Published on: 14 January 2026*
